description:
Ouyang Feng is known as the "Western Venom" of the Five Greats, the top five champions of the first martial arts contest on Mount Hua, Ouyang is best known for his trademark martial arts technique "Toad Skill" and his expertise in toxicology, which earns him his nickname.
Ouyang is depicted as an evil and ruthless villain, who resorts to all sorts of unscrupulous means to achieve his goal of becoming the most powerful kung-fu master. He attempts to seize the fabled Nine Yin Manual, a manual detailing powerful martial arts and inner energy techniques, but is tricked into practicing a wrong and "edited" version of the skills, which causes him to become insane eventually, but ironically, his prowess in martial arts also increases tremendously.
In the sequel, Ouyang dies amidst laughter and forgotten past feuds together with his long-term rival, Hong Qigong. He is buried on Mount Hua beside Hong by his Yang Guo.
name: Ouyang Feng
